info.name: irccloud dark theme
info.description:
makes irccloud dark, changes the chat font to a monospace variant, moves the channel list to the left and multiple other tweaks. This theme is aimed at making irccloud less of a eyestrain and somewhat less cluttered.


21/8/2014: The highlight class changed, fixed this. 
21/7/2014: Updated the style to include pastebins.
info.additionalInfo: Rewrite of the earlier theme without all the unneeded code, updated so it fits some recent changes.
